def_cn: （与名词连用，构成新的名词）表示“违反…法律的人”
def_en: -buster combines with nouns to form new nouns which refer to someone who breaks a particular law.

def_cn: （与名词连用，构成新的名词）表示“打击…犯罪的人”，“解决…问题的人”
def_en: -buster combines with nouns to form new nouns which refer to someone or something that fights or overcomes the specified crime or undesirable activity.
